article_title: Dr. Wergin, the family physician, operates politically
article_text: Lincoln Industries President, Tom Hance, is pleased to announce the selection of John Wilson as technology director. Wilson will oversee, lead, and manage new technologies that Lincoln Industries is evaluating. He will be responsible for all innovation functions related to identifying and de…

article_metadata.author: RICHARD PIERSOL / Lincoln Journal Star

og.description: In November, Dr. Robert Wergin of Milford's Family Medical Center began his year as president of the American Academy of Family Physicians, the first Nebraskan in that office.
og.title: Dr. Wergin, the family physician, operates politically

article_metadata.description: In November, Dr. Robert Wergin of Milford's Family Medical Center began his year as president of the American Academy of Family Physicians, the first Nebraskan in that office.

article_summary:
Lincoln Industries President, Tom Hance, is pleased to announce the selection of John Wilson as technology director.
Wilson will oversee, lead, and manage new technologies that Lincoln Industries is evaluating.
He will be responsible for all innovation functions related to identifying and de…
